evidence.name: Offshore Account Statement
evidence.description: Bank statement from Cayman Islands showing $2.3M deposit on October 15th. Account holder listed as 'Blackwood Holdings LLC'. Routing numbers trace to shell company in Delaware.

evidence.name: Backdated Consulting Agreement
evidence.description: Consulting agreement between Blackwood Corp and Meridian Partners LLC. Date shows July 15 but paper analysis suggests printed in October. Contains suspicious non-compete clause.

evidence.name: Internal Email Thread
evidence.description: Printed email chain between Blake and Charlie discussing 'the arrangement' and 'cleaning up the trail'. Timestamps match the missing funds transfer window.

evidence.name: Security Badge Access Log
evidence.description: Printout showing Blake's badge used at 2:15 AM on October 14th to access secure file room. Only person in building at that hour.
